response.overview: Loose Ends follows a single charged night in and around a neighborhood bar owned by two estranged brothers. As a chaotic party spirals out of control, a web of small decisions, old grudges, and quiet resentments pulls a group of interconnected characters toward one another. A petty crime sets the night in motion, triggering tension between the brothers just as unresolved family issues bubble back to the surface. Meanwhile, party goers navigate their own turning points-moments of honesty, impulsivity, vulnerability, and self-sabotage. Across overlapping story lines, the characters collide in ways that reveal how easily relationships fray-and how difficult it is to tie things back together. By the end of the night, each person must confront what they're running from and decide whether to cut their loose ends or finally face them.
response.tagline: One crazy night determines everyone’s destinies. Loose Ends? Everybody’s got em.
response.title: Loose Ends
